name: cloud-quest
description:
CloudQuest is the solo capstone project I completed to finish up my time at Prime Digital Academy.
This is a test

name: omi-live
description:
A self-hosted streaming solution with a focus on live shopping. Using a third party program to capture video and audio, users are able to livestream from their PC or other device to a web server that broadcasts to all other connected users.
Features include a live chat, a featured product carousel, handy access to affiliate links, and mod permissions for monitoring user interaction.
Technologies used include React, Redux, Express, Socket.io, Node-Media-Server, and Postgres.
